question:
Which of the following lead to algal blooms?
1. Blooms occur when several colonies start combining rapidly when conditions such as nutrient concentrations, salinity and temperature are optimal.
2. Inputs may come from untreated sewage discharges, runoff of fertilizer from farm fields, golf courses, park , etc. & from animal wastes.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Blooms occur when several colonies start combining rapidly when conditions such as nutrient concentrations, salinity and temperature are optimal. Inputs may also come from untreated sewage discharges, runoff of fertilizer from farm fields, golf courses, park , etc. & from animal wastes.
